item.title: Kenyan MPs accuse British soldiers of sexual abuse and environmental destruction
item.description: A two-year investigation details disturbing accounts of rape, sexual violence, murders and environmental destruction.

item.title: Nursery worker admits sexually abusing children
item.description: Vincent Chan, 45, admits multiple offences including assault by penetration.

item.title: Salford Red Devils wound up by High Court over debts
item.description: Troubled former Super League club Salford Red Devils are wound up by the High Court.

item.title: WBC title bout for Sheeraz after Crawford stripped
item.description: Briton Hamzah Sheeraz will fight for the WBC super-middleweight world title after Terence Crawford was stripped of the belt.

item.title: Drunk raccoon found passed out on liquor store floor after breaking in
item.description: The intoxicated animal suffered no injuries and was released back into the wild by animal protection once sober.
